name: d3-extended
description: Extends D3 Selection with helpful functions which are similar to the jQuery API.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -g d3-selection:d3 -n d3Extended -o build/d3-extended.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-extended.js -c -m -o build/d3-extended.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-extended.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-extended.js build/d3-extended.min.js
